entry.title: Converting dos (windows) files to unix files
entry.content:
While editing files on windows system, we get ^M characters added to files and those gets displayed when you open files on unix machines. To remove such ^M characters,

Install dos2unix package

sudo apt-get install sysutils

Convert individual file

dos2unix file_path

Convert files recursively

Run following command to convert recursively all the files inside directory.

find . -type f -exec dos2unix {} \;
